metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29511 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The encoding/xml package in Go (all versions) does not correctly preservethe semantics of element namespace prefixes during tokenizationround-trips, which allows an attacker to craft inputs that behave inconflicting ways during different stages of processing in affecteddownstream applications.

criterions.comment: golang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
golang-1.10 package in trusty/esm is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
